title: hello please... what is the name of 3 fonts
content:
Please help me with this fonts friends. thank you

Font: 

 Kingthings Wrote, Jellyka - le Grand Saut and Wiccan Sans

comments.content:
Are there 4?

1. "No juzques": KingThings-Kevin King/Kingthings Wrote  
 [http://www.dafont.com/kingthings-wrote.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205440/http:/www.dafont.com/kingthings-wrote.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205440im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nopr1_6713.jpg)

2. CuttyFruty-Jellyka Nerevan/Jellyka - le Grand Saut  
 [http://www.dafont.com/jellyka-le-grand-saut-textual.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205440/http:/www.dafont.com/jellyka-le-grand-saut-textual.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205440im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marco1_5650.jpg)
Sorry... jeje are three... and... what is the font name of third image (screenshoot). Please
Couldn't find one like it. Sorry. Maybe someone else will know.

The third one is **[Wiccan Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205440/http:/www.linotype.com/433109/WiccanStdSansIntReg-product.html)** by Comicraft Design (probably a bit manually condensed)  
Try both lower and capital letters e.g.: "La trampa no es lo que..." to find the best natch  
(lower & capital letters on this font, actually produce variations of capitals)
Fivos -- even when I looked directly at that font I didn't match to sample ... Good Eye! Dick
